doc.after: Scotland has five main international airports Glasgow Edinburgh Aberdeen Prestwick and Inverness which together serve 150 international destinations with a wide variety of scheduled and chartered flights 198 GIP operates Edinburgh airport and BAA operates Aberdeen and Glasgow International while Highland and Islands Airports operates 11 regional airports including Inverness which serve the more remote locations 199 Infratil operates Prestwick
